review: Amazing!  I still have a lot to learn, but so easy to get started!  I've ordered a second one!
author: Amazon Customer

review: Got this up up-an-running in just a few minutes and love it! It's a great product for anyone with Amazon Prime! Highly recommended!
author: Anubie

review: Love Fire Stick !!! I ordered it month`s ago, when they had a special for Prime members. Paid $19 for it and it`s worth 3 times as much. Everything works nice and smooth and it comes with small remote.The only think that I didn`t like was the fact that it requires separate charger.
author: Peter Polak

review: A bit tough to set up, but my 10 year old figured it out.  Enjoying it thoroughly now!
author: shelley

review: Very easy to set up, i love it.
author: Jana wright

review: It exceeded all expectations, works great, alot of apps, once in a while the device slows down , but 99% of the time is flawless
author: Marco A Mendoza
